text_clean_combined: --- Upon commencing on Tuesday, November 1, 2022 at 9:30 a.m.
speaker: NA

text_clean_combined: Order. À l'ordre. The Public Order Emergency Commission is now in session. La Commission sur l'état d'urgence est maintenant ouverte.
speaker: THE REGISTRAR

text_clean_combined: Good morning. Bonjour. Just a couple of comments before we get started. This -- the rest of this week, the witnesses being called are in a little different situation in the sense that most, if not all, do not have a witness statement that's been filed, and in some cases, Commission Counsel may not even have interviewed them or interviewed them to any extent. So the estimates of time are, therefore, a little less certain than they normally are. So I just want to raise, if people -- some of the parties have put time in, if you like, as a stakeholder in case something came up, you might want to advise Commission Counsel at the end of the evidence that you're -- you -- there is no need. And those who see something come up that makes it such that they feel they need more time, can maybe be given more time. So I'm going to be a little more flexible than normal in the circumstances because we don't really know what's going to come out and to what degree it will affect one or other party more than what was expected. So I'm just setting that out. The times are challenging this week. They will be big weeks, big days, rather, so I will still be somewhat strict about timelines, but flexible if there is movement available, given that some people, I suspect, and I don't mean to suggest anything nefarious, but people may have taken positions on timing they won't need. So that's just as a preliminary, and that would apply, I think, for the witnesses for the balance of the week. So with that brief introduction, have we got a witness planned?
speaker: COMMISSIONER ROULEAU

text_clean_combined: Yeah, the next witness is Chris Barber.
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Okay. (APPLAUSE)
speaker: COMMISSIONER ROULEAU

text_clean_combined: And if I could ask, and I realise there's a fair amount of interest by some parties, and maybe some emotional investment in some of the testimony, but I would ask that we keep it the way it normally is in a courtroom and in a -- an inquiry so that we can keep it going also. We don't have much time. So with that, go ahead.
speaker: COMMISSIONER ROULEAU

text_clean_combined: Mr. Barber -- sorry, Your Honour. Mr. Barber, will you swear on a religious document, or do you wish to affirm?
speaker: THE REGISTRAR

text_clean_combined: Swear on the Bible, please.
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: For the record, please state your full name and spell it out.
speaker: THE REGISTRAR

text_clean_combined: Christopher John Barber, B-A-R-B-E-R.
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: --- MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER, Sworn:
speaker: NA

text_clean_combined: Good morning, Mr. Barber.
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Good morning.
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: My name is John Mather. I am Commission Counsel. Before I begin my questions, I believe your counsel wants to make a statement.
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: --- STATEMENT BY MR. BRENDAN MILLER:
speaker: NA

text_clean_combined: Good morning, sir. For the record, Brendan Miller, counsel for Freedom Corp. As I believe you already know, we've made invocations under all Evidence Act provisions, both federally and provincially, as well as section 13 of the Charter. That's been done in writing. I wonder if I have to do that each and every time the witness testifies or if the Commission has accepted written invocation I have already provided, sir?
speaker: MR. BRENDAN MILLER

text_clean_combined: I think we can deem that the witness has objected to answers each and every question, and that -- on the grounds of the answers may tend to incriminate him or may tend to establish liability in a civil proceeding. So I think that's taken as a given, and has been filed in the record.
speaker: COMMISSIONER ROULEAU

text_clean_combined: Thank you very much, sir. That's all. That's my statement.
speaker: MR. BRENDAN MILLER

text_clean_combined: Okay.
speaker: COMMISSIONER ROULEAU

text_clean_combined: --- EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER:
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: NA

text_clean_combined: So good morning, again, Mr. Barber. Just so you're aware of the process today, I'm going to ask you questions for approximately the next 90 minutes. When I'm complete, the parties who have requested time will have time to ask you some questions themselves, again, for, depending on how things go, roughly 90 minutes, and we will have a final opportunity to ask you some follow up questions if that proves necessary. Okay?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Yes, sir.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: I want to start with some basic information about yourself. So I understand that you're from Swift Current, Saskatchewan; is that correct?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: I am; correct.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: How long have you lived in Swift Current?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: All my life, 47 years.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: And I also understand that you operate a trucking business called CB Trucking Limited. Do I have that correct?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: That is correct.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Okay. And can you just briefly describe the nature of that business?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Long haul, short haul. We haul agriculture equipment across the Prairies and into the United States.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: And what's your role with the business?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: I'm the business owner and a driver.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: And how many other drivers do you have?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: I employ my son and a couple other lease operators, contract employees.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: How long have you been in the trucking business?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Since I was 18, so just 28 years, roughly.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: And were you operating CB Trucking in January of 2022?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: I was, yes.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: As the Commission understands it, Mr. Barber, you were one of the original organisers of the Freedom Convoy that arrived in Ottawa in January of 2022.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Correct.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: I take it you agree with that?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Correct.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: And you just have to make sure you speak audibly when give your answer ---
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Correct.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: --- just for the transcript. Thank you. How did you get involved in the convoy?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: I was contacted by Brigitte Belton, another social media follower, via the app TikTok. Communication started from there, speaking about possibly slow rolls to protest the mandates for the border crossing coming into effect January 15th for cross border travel for commercial vehicles.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Do you recall when Ms. Belton first contacted you?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: I believe it was the beginning of January sometime, the dates might be fuzzy. January 8th, January 7th, somewhere in there.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: And did you know Ms. Belton before ---
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: I did not, no.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Okay. What did you come to know about Ms. Belton?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: She's just another trucker, a cross-border driver that was facing her job to be lost on the 15th of January unless she complied with the mandates.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: And what did Ms. Belton -- what was she asking you to do?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Get involved to start something to try and speak out against the government going too far in some of these mandates?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: And when you say government going too far in some of these mandates, can you explain at that point in time what mandates were concerning you?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: The cross border travel, specifically.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: And are you talking about the decision of the Federal Government to no longer exempt truckers from the requirement that they be vaccinated, otherwise they would have to quarantine?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Yes, sir.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: You mentioned that Ms. Belton communicated with you on TikTok. Did I hear that correctly?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Yes.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Perhaps for the benefit of the Commission, and maybe people who don't -- who aren't as familiar with social media, can you explain what TikTok is?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: TikTok is an app, a social media app. Short videos under three minutes. My daughter got me into it about three, four years ago, approximately. I surpassed her in followers right away, so that made her quite anxious.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: And prior to getting involved in TikTok, were you using any other social media?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Yeah, I was on Facebook.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: And you noted that you attracted a lot of followers. In January of 2022, do you know how many followers you had on TikTok?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Prior to the convoy?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Yes.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: I would've guessed, roughly guessed at around 30,000, maybe.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Thirty thousand. And you know, in -- by the time, you know, in mid-February 2022, which we'll get to, but how did your followers grow at that point in time?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Quite significantly. We were up -- I don't know the numbers. There were 170,000, somewhere in there.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: So again, prior to Ms. Belton contacting you, can you give us a sense of the sort of content you were posting on TikTok?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: A lot of trucking videos, hauling videos, just -- I'm generally a smart guy on social media, a lot of humour.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Were you posting at all about COVID-19 ---
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Yes.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: --- and public health measures?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Yes.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: How would you describe the nature of those posts?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Angry. Very angry.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Why were you angry?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: The mandates. The provincial mandates, the federal mandates that they just keep tossing more on. It seemed like it was just an overreach or over -- it just -- they went too far on a regular basis, and it was very frustrating.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: How did the COVID-19 public health mandates affect you personally?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: We lost a lot of drivers. What freight I can't handle myself for my company I share with other fellow drivers and other company owners. We lost -- the government likes to say 10 percent of cross border drivers. I didn't see that, I seen it more 35 to 40 percent. We lost a lot of drivers, like a tremendous amount of drivers, where freight was backed up both sides of the border and caused some significant trouble.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: When you say you lost a lot of drivers, what about -- and I understand when we're talking about public health restrictions we're talking at various levels of government, but what about those restrictions led to you losing drivers?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: The lack of the drivers getting the vaccination to be able to cross the border as of the 15th.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: And when you say as of the 15th, do you mean as of the 15th of January 2022?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Yes, sir.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Okay. And so what I understand you to be saying is that the government's decision to no longer exempt truckers from vaccination at -- from vaccination requirements, that was your concern projecting forward.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Correct.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Is that fair?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Yes.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Had you lost drivers prior to that in relation to ---
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: No.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: --- COVID-19?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: No.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Is there any other ways that the -- that -- again, it doesn't matter the level of government for the purpose of the question. Is there any other way that the public health restrictions relating to COVID-19 affected you personally?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Personally? When the COVID vaccine passport came in it made things a little tricky. We weren't allowed to enter restaurants anymore. It was -- I trucked throughout the whole pandemic, I never stopped. I was eating in my truck. I had a coffee pot -- a coffeemaker in my truck. The restaurants were closed, gas stations were closed, bathrooms were closed. It was really tricky. I remember about two weeks into the pandemic thinking this isn't worth it and going home. And then the customer demands kept climbing, so I ended up -- I stayed.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Did you, yourself, get vaccinated?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Yes, sir.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Why did you make that decision?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: I've spent the better part of 16 years running my company, keeping the big carriers away from my customer base, and I was at risk of losing all that hard work to not being able to cross the border anymore.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: When you say big carriers, it's my understanding that you, CB Trucking Limited, is an independent company; correct?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: It's a small company, yes.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Can you explain to the Commissioner what it means to be an independent trucker as opposed to a big carrier?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Yeah. Independent carriers, three trucks on my fleet, it's a lot harder to run a smaller company like that compared to the big companies. Most of my competition is up around the 200 -- 50 to 200 trucks.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: So you indicated in your earlier response that your TikTok following grew as you participated in the Freedom Convoy. In terms of discussing the Freedom Convoy and planning the Freedom Convoy did you use any other social media other than TikTok?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: I did, Facebook, yes.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Any other social media?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Snapchat.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Anything else?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: A little bit on Instagram, I'd say, but not much.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: And I've -- the Commission has seen in some of the documents relating to you that at times you would refer to yourself as an internet troll. Is that accurate?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Unfortunately, yes.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: And can you explain to the Commission what it means to be an internet troll?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: A troublemaker, online troublemaker.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: And can you maybe give an example of what that means, you know, when it comes to TikTok, for instance?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Well, on TikTok I deal with trolls on a regular basis. They constantly attack me. Usually they’re faceless. Some of them you can see their profiles. I engage with them like I always have. I fight back and forth with them on a regular basis, and I’ve done that for many years.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: When Ms. Belton reached out to you and began discussing the possibility of a convoy or a slow roll, I take it that was something you were interested in participating in?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Yes, sir.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: And why was that?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: To speak my part, to do my part to protest. To try and get the government to start listening to us.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: And picking up on that last part, what -- at the outset, what were you hoping to achieve by participating in the convoy?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: I primarily wanted the government to listen to our concerns.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Anything else?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: No, sir.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Were you politically active before COVID-19?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: I was not.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Were you an active member of any political party?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: No, sir.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: One final question about TikTok. We’ve seen information that suggested that in January 2022 you had multiple TikTok accounts. Is that ---
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Yes.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Is that accurate?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Yes.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Why did you have more than one TikTok account?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: The internet troll that I would like to be would constantly become banned for posting inappropriate things or things that went against community standards, so your punishment for that would be seven days -- three to seven days off the device, so you would log into another account.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: So when you were suspended, you would then open another account so you could continue posting.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Yes, sir.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Did you find it hard to gain the followers you had when you started with a new account?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: No. No. I’ve always ran a couple different accounts. Right now I think I post on three different accounts.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: So Ms. Belton contacts you and you said you recall was perhaps early in January 2022 and begins asking you about slow rolls and potentially a convoy. What happened next?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Discussions started. We then moved forward with planning. Other people, other members, other teams became involved really fast. We realized that there was -- there was a lot of support behind us the more we got into the logistics of it all.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Who were involved in the early discussions?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Early discussions, Brigitte Belton and I, a male called Dave Steenburg, and with that, Brigitte introduced me to people like James Bauder with Canada Unity, Patrick King, online social media guy.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: And we’ll have some questions about the moment, but I think what would be beneficial to the Commission is to understand how -- you know, to the extent you can explain it, how you go from Ms. Belton contacting you, raising this idea and then getting to the point where you’re organizing what becomes a large event. Can you explain sort of how that progressed?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: It was completely organic. Everything just literally fell right onto place. It was -- I believe it was about two weeks from the time we started talking about it to the time we actually left. It was extremely fast.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Who was organizing and planning the convoy?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: All of us. There wasn’t one, necessarily, a leader. It was a group of organizers per se. We had people in every province that stepped up. We had helpers in every province that stepped up. We had helpers in every province. It was all -- everyone just came together.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Was there people who were more involved in planning than others?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Yes, sir.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: And who was that?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Well, myself, Tamara Lich, Brigitte Belton, James Bauder and Patrick King.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: And in those two weeks, how was the convoy promoted?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Via social media, for the most part.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Can you provide some more information?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Yeah. Tamara Lich and I were in contact I believe the middle of January. The specific date may be around the 13th, maybe the 10th. Tamara started a Facebook page and a Twitter account for Freedom Convoy 2022. And the word started to spread from there. We kept up on our TikTok videos. We all did Facebook lives. We all promoted it via our independent social media apps.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: And we understand that Ms. Lich started the Facebook page, as you indicated, in or around January 13th. Prior to that, what promotion had been done about the convoy?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Very little. Very little.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Had any promotion been done?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Just little things on social media just getting the word out and finding out who was willing to help and who was coming to the parade.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: It’s the Commission’s understanding that you participated in a Facebook live event on January 13th, 2022. Do you know what I’m referring to?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Yes.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: And in that Facebook live event, in attendance were yourself, James Bauder, who you’ve referenced, Ms. Belton, who we’ve spoken about, and Pat King. Does that accord with your recollection?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Yes, sir.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: And there was other individuals there who were assisting and planning. Is that fair?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: I believe so, yes.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: And I understand that that video took place prior to Mrs. -- Ms. Lich’s involvement. Is that correct?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: I believe Ms. Lich was involved at that point. I believe that she was busy that night and could not attend that, if my memory serves me right.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: And have you reviewed that video prior to your testimony?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: I have, yes.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Okay. And it’s approximately an hour and a half long, and subject to any comments from the parties, what I suggest to do is just read out the document ID and have it entered without showing the video itself because I would run out of time if that had happened. So it is COM00000829. And the Commission has also asked a transcriptionist to prepare a transcription of that video, which I may ask you about later, but again, I’m just going to read out the document ID right now, which is COM00000838. So Mr. Barber, I can take you to portions of the transcript if it will assist, but in reviewing the video, it strikes the Commission that, at that point in time, both Mr. Bauder and Mr. King were active -- were already actively involved in planning routes and promoting the convoy to the people that they were already connected with. Is that a fair statement?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Correct.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: And do you know how Mr. Bauder and Mr. King were promoting the convoy?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Can I add -- I can add that Canada Unity became involved, and Canada Unity was actually planning -- I learned later they were planning some sort of a route across Canada to Ottawa for a protest. They had the stops and everything already planned. They had a web site ready. They had -- everything was all in place, to my recollection.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: So yes, the Commission’s understanding is Mr. Bauder had a web site through Canada Unity and on that web site there was already route maps and ---
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Yes.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: --- stops and locations. Is that your understanding?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Yes, correct.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: And Mr. Bauder is expected to testify, and we can ask him more questions about that. So I just want to clarify what you said there. Was -- is it your recollection that that planning was already in place by the time you were connected with Mr. Bauder?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: I believe so, yes.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: And do you know how Mr. Bauder got connected to you and Ms. Belton?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: I believe through Brigitte Belton.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: In the video from January 13th, 2022, which I’ve already referenced, Mr. Bauder presented a document that he referred to as a Memorandum of Understanding. Do you recall that?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Yes.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Were you aware of the Memorandum of Understanding before January 13th, 2022?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: No, sir. No.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Sorry. And just for the sake of the transcriptionist, just if you could wait till I’m finished my question before answering. Just cleaner transcript. So were you aware of that memorandum?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: No, I was not.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Okay. What do you recall Mr. Bauder saying about the Memorandum of Understanding?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: I reviewed the video just a couple days ago, and I remembered again. He just -- I believe he just explained how the document worked and that it had already been sent to the government -- Governor-General and to the government, I believe.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Do you recall if, at that time -- and when I say at that time, I mean January 13th -- if you had an understanding then what Mr. Bauder was hoping to do with his Memorandum of Understanding?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: I believe I just -- I ignored it. I don’t know. I wasn’t into that sort of thing.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: And again, we’re -- we expect to hear from Mr. Bauder and we’ll hear his evidence on it. The Commission understands that one of the things that the Memorandum of Understanding presented was a notion that in respect of the COVID-19 mandates that there -- Mr. Bauder believed that there was not enough time for lawsuits to challenge those mandates and that, in fact, through a piece of law called the Helsinki Act that the -- a group of -- a citizens committee could come to an agreement with the Senate and any mandates they viewed as unlawful would stop. Is that your understanding of, ultimately, what the Memorandum of Understanding meant?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Not to my knowledge. To this day, I still have yet to read the Memorandum of Understanding. I have no clue what’s in the document and I will never read it.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: In January 2022, did you have any understanding what Mr. Bauder's roles were with the convoy that he had organized?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: No, I did not. Like I said before, it was a matter of a whole bunch of different groups coming together at the perfect timing and having that input into the planning of it, and everyone had their piece. And we were so unorganized for the most part, we used whatever we could, whatever means, whatever tools we could find.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: In the early planning stage, what was Brigitte Belton doing?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Same as myself. She was posting TikTok videos and promoting through her Facebook.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: And Mr. King who was on the January 13th livestream, what was he doing?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: I believe the same thing. Patrick had a quite large following on social media, especially Facebook. So he promoted and did videos on his platform.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: And prior to January 2022, did you know who Pat King was?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: I did not, no.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: And how were you first introduced to him?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Via the Zoom call on the 13th, I believe.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: And maybe I'll ask this at this point, prior to the January 13th Facebook livestream, had you participated in any calls or meetings with Mr. Bauder or Mr. King?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: I don't believe so. There might have been one in there earlier. I don't recall one personally.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Do you recall how you were introduced to Mr. King?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: I don't, sorry.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: When you first came to understand that Mr. King was promoting the convoy, what did you come to learn about him?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Just another helping hand, another person with a large following that could -- that would help.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Did you come to learn anything about his background prior to January 2022?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Not until -- no. Not until probably two days into the convoy itself.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: When you were meeting Mr. King and Mr. Bauder and Ms. Belton, did you ask any of them about their backgrounds and why they were participating in the convoy?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: I believe so, yes. I understand Patrick King had children that were unvaccinated, I believe, and Brigitte was the fact that she was going to lose her job on the 15th of January.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: At that point in time, did you have any questions yourself about who am I getting -- who am I organizing with and who are these people who are going to assist me in this?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: I think I was just so excited and so overwhelmed right from the day one. I don't think I really had time. It was a very busy time.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: The Commission understands that many people stated goal in terms of the convoy was to end COVID- 19 mandates; is that fair?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Correct.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Were you aware of anyone who participated in the early organization who had a different goal than that?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: No, sir.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: As the convoy began travelling to Ottawa and then after it arrived in Ottawa, do you believe there were people who participated who wanted something more than to end COVID-19 mandates?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Yes.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: And can you describe why you -- the basis of that belief?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: There was different organizations that came and went. For the most part, we stayed as a close group, Tamara and myself, Brigitte. The core group of actual truckers stayed together. Organizations kind of came in, tried to set camp up and we either found a way to keep it under control or keep in the -- it was a power struggle a lot of the time.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Can you just -- can you provide some more details about that power struggle, what organizations, what they were trying to do and what you did in response?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Well, we had a little bit of conflict between Canada Unity, that was one, not necessarily conflict, but Taking Back our Freedoms was involved there. No conflict, but the war vets joined us. They were beside us the entire time. We had retired police officers, OPP.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: So Canada Unity, that's Mr. Bauder's organization; is that right?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Correct.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Can you explain to me what the conflict was with Canada Unity?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Power control. Simple.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: What was Canada Unity doing that you didn't agree with?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: I didn't like the MOU, I believe, even though I still have yet to read it.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: So at some point, I take it you came to understand what Canada Unity was trying to achieve with the MOU; is that fair?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: I still believe that they were after the same things we were. I believe that maybe it was more mask mandates, more COVID restrictions in general.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: So you indicated that the conflict with Canada Unity was about the MOU and I'm just trying to understand what about the MOU had -- gave rise to conflict?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Improperly written MOU. According to the people that I spoke to about it, it wasn't something on our agenda. It wasn't something we were pushing for. It had nothing to do with the reason why we actually came to Ottawa.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Who did you speak to about the MOU?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Ms. Lich.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: And what did she tell you about the MOU?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: We had the same opinion.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: But I -- what did she tell you about what was in the MOU?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: I can't speak for what Tamara said. I'm not sure if she's read it or not.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Did you ---
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: She wasn't ---
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: --- did you have any concerns that the MOU advocated or provided for an undemocratic change of power in Canada?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: I heard rumours about it being that way. I heard rumours on both sides that it could be interpreted that way and then it couldn't be interpreted that way. It was kind of a mixed.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Did you take any steps to figure out what exactly Mr. Bauder was trying to achieve with the MOU?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Not necessarily. We -- I remember calling on Mr. Bauder, having him renounce the MOU partial the way through the convoy.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Do you recall roughly when that occurred?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: I do not.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: And what led you to ultimately make a phone call to Mr. Bauder and ask him to renounce it?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: I believe it was Tamara that made the call. Just too much -- there was too much highlight in it. There was too much spotlight in this document that we didn't have anything to do with.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: And when you say too much highlight and too much spotlight, are you talking about -- I think you characterized it as the rumours that it called for something undemocratic?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Correct.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: What happened after, to your understanding, Ms. Lich called Mr. Bauder and asked him to rescind it?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: I believe it was rescind [sic]. I believe they removed it.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Did you continue working with Mr. Bauder throughout the convoy?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: James was around. Not necessarily with him. He was around. We seen each other from time to time.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Another group you mentioned in terms of their being -- and maybe this wasn't your words, but I understand a power struggle, is that fair, among groups?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Yeah.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Yeah. Another group you mentioned was Taking Back our Freedoms?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Yes.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Who was Taking Back our Freedoms?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: I don't know names. I know Roy and James were the ones that came out. They tried to help us out, create structure inside the meetings and the day- to-day planning.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Do you know what Taking Back our Freedoms' goals were with respect to the convoy?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: To this day, I do not. I believe mandate freedom, government gone too far.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: And I think you described there was a level of friction with them; is that fair?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: From times, yeah, there was, yes.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: And is there -- did you take any steps -- when you had this group that there was some friction or conflict with, did you take any steps to figure out what their goals or what they were trying to do?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: I believe so, yes.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: And what did you do?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: I wasn't personally part of those. I found my role outside walking the streets a lot. So the inner meetings, I tended to skip out on quite a bit.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: And we've spoken already a little bit about Ms. Lich, who I -- as I understand it, your recollection is that she was likely involved around the time of the January 13th livestream, she just did not participate; did I have that correctly?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: I believe so.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: How did Ms. Lich become involved in the Freedom Convoy?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Ms. Lich called me on my cell phone, I believe, like I said, somewhere before the 10th of January, and told me she had a little bit of experience in the department of protesting and convoy. She was part of the 2019 United We Roll Tour. We needed help and I acknowledged that. It was just a phone call out of the blue. Tamara got my phone number and the friendship and continued.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Do you ever find out how Ms. Lich got your phone number?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: She said the name before. I don't remember what the name was. She -- a friend of a friend had my contact.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: And you mentioned that Ms. Lich had participated in the 2019 United We Roll convoy.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Correct.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: When Ms. Lich phoned you, did you know what that was?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Yes, I did.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Okay. And can you explain to the Commission what the 2019 United We Roll convoy was?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Oil and gas. I believe they came from Alberta to Ottawa protesting pipeline shutdowns or pipeline building, one of the two.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: And Ms. Lich, it was your understanding, was involved in that convoy?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: She was involved with some of the…
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: And did you understand that Mr. King was also involved in that conversation?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Yes. Afterwards.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: What about Mr. Bauder?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: I don’t know about James.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: When Ms. Lich called you, had you heard of Tamara Lich before?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: No, I had not.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: And what did you come to know about Ms. Lich?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: She’s a mother, she’s a grandmother; she’s a regular Albertan, good hearted, strong person.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Did you become aware, in your early conversations with Ms. Lich that she had been -- participated in the Wexit Movement in Alberta and been involved in the Maverick Party?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: I believe I realized -- I was told about that in or out to Ottawa.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: And is it Ms. Lich who told you that, or did someone else tell you?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Yes, it was Ms. Lich, yes.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Did you have any concerns that, in participating in the convoys, Ms. Lich would be pursuing goals other than mass mandates and maybe -- pursuing political goals of either the Wexit Movement or the Maverick Party?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: That was not my -- no, I didn’t feel that at all.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Is that something you discussed with Ms. Lich?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: I don’t know if I discussed it, but it wasn’t really an issue. We never discussed anything in detail. It was noted that she was part of that in the past. I believe she wasn’t -- I mean, I don’t think she was -- or she is now. She was, and it was never an issue after that.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: We expect that there may be evidence that, you know, whether it be Ms. Lich or other people who became involved in the convoy organization, that there was an attempt to use the convoy as an opportunity to pursue political goals that weren’t just about ending the COVID-19 mandates, including political goals that may exist for -- within the Maverick Party or within the Wexit Movement; is that a concern that you have now, looking back?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: No. It was never brought to my attention that they were a player in this situation. And that wasn’t the reason why we came to Ottawa; I would have fought that.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: And why would you have fought that?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: That wasn’t the reason why we came to Ottawa. We came to Ottawa for mass -- or for, sorry, for border mandates.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Now I’m going to ask you some questions about the process of having trucks begin in British Columbia and drive across Canada and then arrive in Ottawa. First question: Do you have a sense of how many trucks participated in the convoy that you had organized with Mr. Bauder, Mr. King, Ms. Belton, Ms. Lich?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: The tricky part was trying to get a solid number. There would be a certain amount of trucks, cars, buses, campers, that would come into the convoy for a short period of time, let’s say from Regina to Winnipeg, just to take part in it and would exit off, and at that same time more people would come in from Winnipeg to go to Kenora. I know for a fact some people left with their children in a semi from Saskatchewan planning on going to Regina and went home three weeks later. We ranged anywhere from 500 to 2,500 vehicles, is what I was told. Looking in the mirrors it was incredible to see the lights behind you and the long lines. And watching the videos, it was approximately 25 kilometres long at some times.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Did you ever expect that level of participation?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: No, not in my wildest dreams.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: What was your reaction when you saw the level of participation?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Well, there was a lot of tears.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Can you expand on that?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Emotions, we’re -- the things that we seen out the windshield of the truck as we crossed the Prairies, and in Ontario, overwhelming support; people standing on the side of the highways, people lining overpasses. We were often late by around two hours; we were never really on schedule. And people stood in frigid temperatures, minus 20 to minus 30, just to get a chance to see us come through.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Could you explain to the Commission how the convoy organization was able to coordinate that movement of trucks to come to Ottawa; how did people know when they -- where they were supposed to be, where the convoy was, what was going to happen to them when they joined the convoy?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: We had code of ethics, we had rules to follow, we had speeds to endure, we had constant communication on the -- either VHF FM radios or CB radios; cellphone interaction with other people too. Constant communication. Safety was number one priority. When you’re leading that many vehicles of the -- error was what could have been at any minute. So we managed to successfully make it from the West to Ottawa without a single issue, to my knowledge.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRIS BARBER

text_clean_combined: During that travel who was primarily responsible for all of that coordination you’re talking about?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: I was at the lead of the pack. We had two escort pilot trucks leading us. Patrick King was in his motorhome halfway back looking after the back pack. It was just -- it was constant communication on the radio; constantly upping our speeds, lowering our speeds, trying to keep the convoy at a steady pace together. If I was going too fast, people would start to lag and there would be a distance. We would have to then slow down and catch everybody up.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Was there any point on the journey to Ottawa where you were concerned that the convoy, you know, might not make it, or something may interfere in the trucks arriving?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: No. No, everything was well orchestrated. We had police communication right from -- my role began from Swift Current to Medicine Hat, Alberta, where I picked up Ms. Lich and joined the West convoy, and that was where my part started. We were in communication with -- the first police force would have been Medicine Hat. We were in contact with Swift Current, Regina, Moosejaw, all the way across the country for -- for police escorts. If there was a traffic light, we actually called for traffic control at those intersections so we could proceed through the intersections safely.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Right. And it’s the Commission’s understanding, based on some of the documents that your counsel has produced, that people were in contact with the police on a daily basis.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Yes, sir.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Is that accurate?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Yes.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: And were you one of those people?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: I was, yes.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Again, based on the documents the Commission’s received, we also understand that when the convoy arrived in Ontario, that an OPP escort was there to meet the convoy; is that correct?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Yes.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Can you just provide some more explanation about that?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: I don’t know his last name, his name was Marty, he met us at the West Hawk scale which is the scale that borders Ontario and Manitoba. He met us there; he jumped out in front and led us. I believe Marty follow -- or led us, I believe, to Thunder Bay’ish area where then he got us in Kenora, he led us downtown Kenora to the rec centre parking lot where we were -- where we staged for the evening. We had a funny story -- not a funny story, but coming into Headingly, Manitoba, the Hutterite communities from around the Winnipeg area came into Headingly with food trailers. They had hot food, burgers, everything you could think of. RCMP had called me and said the amount of people in the Headingly area was too great; it was a huge risk to safety to get in and out of the parking lot for the truck stop. So we had to abandon the plan to stop. So we carried on around Winnipeg, and three Hutterite vehicles with trailers followed us to Kenora and fed us in the parking lot at the rec centre that night. It was cold as can be and they had the barbeques out and the slow cookers; it was quite amazing.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: So when you get into Ontario, I assume the daily contact with the police continued.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Yes.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: And did that include daily contact with both the OPP and the OPS, or would -- can you just explain what police services you were...
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Contact was made with, I believe her name was Isabelle, from OPS. Isabelle was in constant contact with, I believe Chris Garrah of Adopt a trucker, and things were planned on our arrival.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: And were you in contact with Isabelle or anyone from the Ottawa Police Service?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: I spoke with Isabelle a few times on the phone. I’ve met her once on the ground here. I didn’t have a lot of logistics with Isabelle, that was already being looked after.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: And did you speak with Isabelle prior to the convoy’s arrival in Ottawa?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: I believe I did. I made contact with Isabelle but I’m not sure exactly when. There was a phone call made to say, “I’m Chris, here’s my contact.”
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: When you were speaking with either the OPP or the OPS -- and I’m talking about you personally -- what were you telling them about the convoy’s plans when they arrived in Ottawa?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Exactly what it was. We were there to protest border mandates, and our main priority was safety and working with law enforcement, whatever it took.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Do you recall having any discussions with any police officers about how long the protest might last?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: I think the discussion started after the first weekend with OPS, I believe, and we had one -- a couple of OPP officers in constant contact too, I know his name was Andrew.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: So prior to that -- prior to that point you’ve referenced, so after the first weekend did you discuss the potential length of the protest with any police officials?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: I believe not.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: At what point did you realize that the protest may continue for an extended period of time?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: I don’t know if I ever really thought much into it. Everything moved so fast when we arrived.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Prior to arriving in Ottawa, had you personally turned your mind to how long you would stay?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Well, my business would suffer the longer I was away from it. So that in the back of my mind -- I really didn’t know. It was the movement of its own and it continued to grow, and you mentally had to try and keep up with it, I guess.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: In your discussions with either the OPP or the OPS as the convoy was approaching Ottawa, did any of the police services give you direction on where you could park the trucks once you arrived in Ottawa?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Interesting story: All the way to Ottawa, my understanding via people in the convoy, Canada Unity, was that we had two major staging areas; one was Major Hill Park, and the other one was Confederate Park. I believe Confederate. And that was -- to my understanding, that’s where we were allowed to park and protest peacefully.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Is that where you ultimately parked?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: That was not, no.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: And how did -- where did -- I understand that you parked your truck on Wellington Street; is that fair?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: We had a police escort down Sir John A. Macdonald off the 417. My understanding -- I didn’t know this till afterwards -- police blocked the convoy after myself and another tractor-trailer went through. They shut the convoy down around the War Museum on Sir John A. Macdonald. They then led myself and Tamara and the pilot trucks. We made it to roughly the Supreme Court on Wellington, and that was as far as we could go. There was a ton of vehicles had come in the night before, apparently, wanting to be there for the arrival. So there had already been tractor-trailers lined up in front of Parliament down to, approximately, the Supreme Court.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Did that surprise you to see that there was already large commercial vehicles?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Yes.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: And why did that surprise you?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: I was unaware of it. My understanding was we were going to come in, the police were going to escort us right to the two parks. We would park safely out of the way, and it would be fine.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Did anyone from any police service ever explain to you what had changed?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: I believe not, no. I don’t know if I ever asked that question.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Did anyone else ever explain to you what had led to the park -- the vehicles being parked in the downtown core as opposed to the parks you identified?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Apparently, we caught them off guard; we overwhelmed them right off the bat. With the trucks coming in the night before that we were unaware of, our main convoy, as far as I know, had nothing to do with those prior arrivals, so...
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Have you since learned who was the early arrivals?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: They were all semi operators. I knew a couple from my home province. They were in the area, apparently. They weren’t part of the convoy, but they were in the area, and they took part in the protest.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: So I asked you this and I think you’ve confirmed it, but you parked your vehicle on Wellington Street; is that correct?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: Yes.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: After you parked there, at any point in time up until, we’ll say, February 14th, were you given any indication by any police services that you shouldn’t be parked on Wellington and you’d need to move?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: I was not, no.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: Did that come as a surprise to you?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: I don’t know if I really had time to think if it was a surprise, it was so fast-paced.
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. CHRISTOPHER BARBER

text_clean_combined: The Commission has heard evidence from several police witnesses who have been asked questions essentially about whether more could have been done to limit or control the size and scope of the protest in Ottawa in the early days. I’ve heard your answers but I’m just going to ask you one more time; was the police response to the convoy what you were expecting or anticipating when you arrived?
section_header: EXAMINATION IN-CHIEF BY MR. JOHN MATHER
speaker: MR. JOHN MATHER

text_clean_combined: That’s a hard question to answer. I believe they did the best they could. The scope of the amount of vehicles that came in, I don’t know how things went so -- went so wrong when we first arrived. We were -- they did what they could. They did the best we could. We were all -- 90 percent of the trucks were stuck out on Sir John A. Macdonald, I believe, with -- pretty much abandoned. Nobody knew where to go, nobody had direction.
